references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of in-context learning, which is foundational to the proposed CONTEXTSSL method.

references.paper_title: VICReg: Variance-invariance-covariance regularization for self-supervised learning
references.reason: VICReg is a key comparative method in the paper, representing state-of-the-art invariant self-supervised learning.

references.paper_title: Self-supervised learning of split invariant equivariant representations
references.reason: This paper is a key comparative method, demonstrating a state-of-the-art approach to equivariant self-supervised learning.

references.paper_title: A simple framework for contrastive learning of visual representations
references.reason: SimCLR is another key comparative method, highly influential in the field of contrastive self-supervised learning.
This paper is another important comparative method, proposing a different approach to enforcing equivariance in self-supervised learning.
